Title: Scary DOC! Support, Killer, Semi-carry Build

ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Use to remove the enemy wards and kill invisible heroes.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: You can use for both defensive use, when you need a fast heal or dont have mana. Or offensive, after maledict.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Aghanins will provide a nice help on the ultimate, if the other team have a lot of disables you can do a shadow blade or bkb before aghanins.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: Bloodstone will help you mantain the heal all the time
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: Like BkB is useful to survive and mantain your ult up.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: This will provide a nice mana pool and help your allies, after you can transform into a bloodstone.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Nice for stats for low cost.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: If you team is -armor based, this will help with roshan kills

AbilityTooltips.witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask: Useful to farm and to make the big plays!
AbilityTooltips.witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration: Healing lv 1 helps a lot in the early game, and the early  urn will help with manahealth regen.
AbilityTooltips.witch_doctor_maledict: The killer skill, its a little hard to hit more than 1 person, but when you do its beautiful.
AbilityTooltips.witch_doctor_death_ward: Killer machine, just need to get the right position to drop this.
